title: Publish Draft Version 51 to Production

requirements.text: Promote the currently deployed Draft Version 51 to the Internet Computer mainnet (production) by executing the production deployment checklist steps, including verifying production environment variables and targeting the `ic` network.
acceptanceCriteria: Production environment variables are verified before deployment, including `CANISTER_ID_BACKEND`, `CANISTER_ID_FRONTEND`, and `II_URL=https://identity.ic0.app` (per `frontend/README_PRODUCTION_ENV.md`).
Frontend assets are published to the production frontend canister and load successfully at `https://<CANISTER_ID_FRONTEND>.ic0.app`.
Backend canister is confirmed healthy before publishing the frontend (e.g., status/cycles and a basic query call succeeds).

requirements.text: Run the production smoke test procedure after publishing to confirm authentication and core flows work in production, and record results in the existing smoke test results template file.
acceptanceCriteria: Smoke tests are executed on the production URL after publishing (using the steps in `frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V48.md` as the baseline procedure).
Results are recorded in `frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_RESULTS_V48.md`, including PASS/FAIL for each section and diagnostics for any failures.

If any critical issues are encountered (app fails to load, cannot sign in, data loss, security issue, or backend out-of-cycles/traps), publishing is treated as failed and the issue is documented in the results file.

constraints: No new product features or code changes are introduced as part of this request; this is a publish/promotion action only.
Use Internet Identity production URL exactly as `https://identity.ic0.app`.
nonGoals: Implementing new frontend or backend functionality.
Changing UI design, routes, or translations as part of this publish request.
Introducing new canisters or external services.
